DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine onset , duration , degree response patient hormone-refractory , metastatic adenocarcinoma prostate treat paclitaxel bryostatin 1 . II . Determine toxicity regimen patient . III . Determine overall survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This open-label , multicenter study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour day 1 , 8 , 15 bryostatin 1 IV 1 hour day 2 , 9 , 16 . Treatment repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow monthly 6 month every 3 month thereafter .
